 <head>
  <script>
   window.jppolPerf = {
    
    debug: false,
    ssoid: "f08d3bcc-9f50-4be3-aa70-9190b80fb610",
    sessionId: "473b5937-9fdd-4314-b3ca-4caee7c1f4cc",
    device: "desktop",
    
    endpoint: "/webservice/metrics/push",
    delay: 2000,
    dataQueue: [],
    browserMeasureSupported: true,
    rootMargin: "-54px 0px 0px 0px",
    init: function () {
      var self = this;

      var supported = window.performance && (window.performance.mark !== undefined) && (window.performance.measure !== undefined);
      if (!supported) {
        this.browserMeasureSupported = false;
        this.log("performance.mark not supported");
      }

      if (this.device === "mobile") {
        this.rootMargin = "0px";
      }

      
      try {
        this.fcp();
        this.lcp();
        this.fid();
        this.cls();
      } catch (error) {
        console.log(error);
      }

      this.measureObserver();
      this.detectVisibility();
      this.initSendDataInterval();
      window.addEventListener('load', function () {
        self.addAdditionalData();
      });
      
    },
    detectVisibility: function () {
      var self = this;
      if (document.visibilityState) {
        document.addEventListener("visibilitychange", function () {
          self.dataQueue.push({
            visibilityState: document.visibilityState,
            time: window.performance.now()
          });
        }, false);
      }
      
    },
    observeAd: function (target) {
      
      if (!this.browserMeasureSupported) {
        this.log("performance.mark not supported");
        return;
      }
      if (!"IntersectionObserver" in window) {
        this.log("IntersectionObserver not supported");
        return;
      }
      var self = this;
      var elem = document.getElementById(target);
      if (elem) {
        new IntersectionObserver(function (entries, observer) {
          for (const entry of entries) {

            var valid = entry.target.clientHeight !== 0 && entry.target.clientWidth !== 0;
            var viewable = false;
            if (valid && entry.isIntersecting >= 0.5) {
                viewable = true;
            }
            var data = {
              targetId: entry.target.id,
              viewable: viewable,
              time: window.performance.now(),
              entry: entry
            };
            self.debug ? console.log("observeAd", entry.target.id, data) : null;
            self.dataQueue.push(data);
          }
        }, {
          rootMargin: self.rootMargin, 
          threshold: [0.5],
        }).observe(elem);
      } else {
        self.debug ? console.log("Could not find element with id:", target, elem) : null;
      }
    },
    measureObserver: function () {
      var self = this;
      new PerformanceObserver(function (list, obj) {
        var entries = list.getEntries();
        for (var i = 0; i < entries.length; i++) {
          self.dataQueue.push(entries[i].toJSON());
        }
      }).observe({entryTypes: ["measure"]});
    },
    
    fcp: function () {
      var self = this;
      new PerformanceObserver(function (list, obj) {
        var entries = list.getEntriesByName('first-contentful-paint');
        for (var i = 0; i < entries.length; i++) {
          self.dataQueue.push(entries[i].toJSON());
        }
      }).observe({type: 'paint', buffered: true});
    },
    
    lcp: function () {
      var self = this;
      new PerformanceObserver(function (list, obj) {
        var entries = list.getEntries();
        for (var i = 0; i < entries.length; i++) {
          self.dataQueue.push(entries[i].toJSON());
        }
      }).observe({type: 'largest-contentful-paint', buffered: true});
    },
    
    fid: function () {
      var self = this;
      new PerformanceObserver(function (list, obj) {
        var entries = list.getEntries();
        for (var i = 0; i < entries.length; i++) {
          self.dataQueue.push(entries[i].toJSON());
        }
      }).observe({type: 'first-input', buffered: true});
    },
    
    cls: function () {
      var self = this;
      // let cls = 0;
      new PerformanceObserver(function (list, obj) {
        var entries = list.getEntries();
        for (var i = 0; i < entries.length; i++) {
          var entry = entries[i];
          if (!entry.hadRecentInput) {
            // cls += entry.value;
            self.dataQueue.push(entry.toJSON());
          }
        }
      }).observe({type: 'layout-shift', buffered: true});
    },
    addAdditionalData: function () {
      var data = {};
      data.referer = document.referrer;
      if (window.hasOwnProperty("navigator") && window.navigator.userAgent) {
        data.userAgent = window.navigator.userAgent;
      }
      if (window.hasOwnProperty("jppolCMP")
        && window.jppolCMP.hasOwnProperty("fullConsent")) {
        data.fullConsent = window.jppolCMP.fullConsent;
      }
      if (window.hasOwnProperty("performance") && typeof (window.performance.getEntriesByType) === "function") {
        data.navigationTiming = window.performance.getEntriesByType("navigation");
      }
      this.dataQueue.push(data);
    },
    
    xhr: function () {
      var self = this;
      var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
      xhr.timeout = 1200;
      xhr.responseType = 'json';
      xhr.open("POST", this.endpoint, true);
      xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded");
      xhr.setRequestHeader("ssoid", self.ssoid);
      xhr.setRequestHeader("sessionid", self.sessionId);
      xhr.setRequestHeader("device", self.device);
      
      return xhr;
    },
    initSendDataInterval: function () {
      var self = this;
      var t = setInterval(function () {
        if (self.dataQueue.length) {
          var xhr = self.xhr();
          
          xhr.setRequestHeader("data", JSON.stringify(self.dataQueue.splice(0, 14)));
          xhr.send();
        }
      }, this.delay);
    },
    log: function (message) {
      if (this.debug) {
        console.log(message);
      }
    },
  };
  jppolPerf.init();
  if ( window.jppolPerf.browserMeasureSupported) {
    window.performance.measure("jppolPerf:initialized");
  }
  </script>

  <script>
   if (window.jppolPerf && window.jppolPerf.browserMeasureSupported) {

  }
  window.jppolCMP = {
    debug: false,
    reloadPageOnFullConsent: false,
    cookieWallArticleBlacklist: [4951194, 5636597, 5584484, 7259728, 7259663, 7259637, 7259643, 7259664, 7259741, 7259739, 7692251],
    html: {
      backgroundImage: '<div style="width:100%;height:210px;background: center url(/static/assets/images/gdpr/embed-background.png) no-repeat;"></div>',

    embedHtmlNoConsent: function (name) {

      if (window.polContext__) {
        if (window.polContext__.page) {

    vendors: {
      
      GTM: {
        name: "Google Tag Manager",
        required: [],
        loaded: false,
        load: function () {
          jppolCMP.debug ? console.log('jppolCMP - "' + this.name + '" requires consent from:', this.required) : null;

          var valid = jppolCMP.checkConsentByIds(this.required);

          if (valid) {
            (function (w, d, s, l, i) {
              w[l] = w[l] || [];
              w[l].push({'gtm.start': new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'});
              var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0], j = d.createElement(s), dl = l !== 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
              j.async = true;
              j.src = 'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl + '&gtm_auth=w4ERo3HXKXOSNKX0IHeuSQ&gtm_preview=env-2&gtm_cookies_win=x';
              f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TPRSNTR');
            this.loaded = true;
          } else {
            jppolCMP.debug ? console.log('jppolCMP - "' + this.name + "' will not load") : null;
          }
        }
      },

        name: "AppNexus",

          jppolCMP.debug ? console.log('jppolCMP - "' + this.name + '" NOW STARTING UP') : null;
          window.jppolCMP.createScript('/static/js/appnexus/ast.js?d=18538ac8', true, function () {
            window.astHandler ? window.astHandler.init() : console.log('window.astHandler not defined');
          });
          this.loaded = true;
        },
      },

              window.adsmtag = adsmtag || {};

      AudienceProject: {
        name: "AudienceProject Aps",

        load: function () {
          jppolCMP.debug ? console.log('jppolCMP - "' + this.name + '" requires consent from:', this.required) : null;

          var valid = jppolCMP.checkConsentByIds(this.required);

          if (valid) {
            jppolCMP.createScript("https://sak.userreport.com/jppol/launcher.js", true, function () {
              window.audienceProjectLayer = window.audienceProjectLayer || [];

              var id = "";
              if (window.hasOwnProperty("polContext__")
                && window.polContext__.hasOwnProperty("user")
                && window.polContext__.user.hasOwnProperty("relevanceId")
                && window.polContext__.user.relevanceId !== "") {
                id = window.polContext__.user.relevanceId;
              } else {
                // check localStorage for ID
                id = window.localStorage.getItem("_ls_value");
              }

              if (id !== null && id !== "") {
                function audienceProject() {
                  window.audienceProjectLayer.push(arguments);
                }

                audienceProject('sync', 'jppol', 'jpid', id);
              }
            });
            this.loaded = true;
          } else {
            jppolCMP.debug ? console.log('jppolCMP - "' + this.name + "' will not load") : null;
          }
        }
      },
      facebook: {
        name: "Facebook",
        required: ["5e7e1298b8e05c54a85c52d2"],
        loaded: false,
        load: function () {
          jppolCMP.debug ? console.log('jppolCMP - "' + this.name + '" requires consent from:', this.required) : null;

          var valid = jppolCMP.checkConsentByIds(this.required);

          if (valid) {
            try {
              function consentGrant() {
                var checkState = setInterval(function () {
                  
                  if (window.fbq.getState && typeof (window.fbq.getState) === "function") {
                    var state = window.fbq.getState();
                    if (state.pixels.length) {
                      clearInterval(checkState);
                      
                      window.fbq('consent', 'grant');
                    } else {
                      window.fbq('consent', 'grant');
                    }
                  }
                }, 100);
              }

              window.fbq ? consentGrant() : document.addEventListener('fPixelInit', function () {
                consentGrant();
              });
            } catch (error) {
              console.log('facebook "fbq" failed:', error);
            }
            this.loaded = true;
          } else {
            jppolCMP.debug ? console.log('jppolCMP - "' + this.name + "' will not load") : null;
          }
        }
      },
      Userneeds: {
        name: "Userneeds Aps",
        required: ["5fd36e80c3dc2d271e2a6792"],
        loaded: false,
        load: function () {
          jppolCMP.debug ? console.log('jppolCMP - "' + this.name + '" requires consent from:', this.required) : null;

          var valid = jppolCMP.checkConsentByIds(this.required);

          if (valid) {
            jppolCMP.onReady(function () {
              (function (u, n, t, r, k) {
                n['UserneedsTracker'] = t;
                n[t] = n[t] || function () {
                  (n[t].f = n[t].f || []).push(arguments)
                }, n[t].t = 1 * new Date();
                var s = u.createElement(r);
                s.async = 1, s.src = "https://media.userneeds.com/scripts/stats/unt.min.js", s.id = "un-bl-" + t;
                k = u.getElementsByTagName(r)[0];
                k.parentNode.insertBefore(s, k);
              })(document, window, "unt", "script");
              window.unt("register", "SNWQnfFwqXZR");
              // Add viewports tracking by adding an array of container IDs:
              window.unt("viewports", ["#megaboard_top", "#adsm-wallpaper", "#adsm-skin-container", "#adnm-topscroll-container-wrapper", "#adnm-html-topscroll-frame-wrapper", "#adnm-html-desktop-interscroll-frame-wrapper", "#adnm-desktop-interscroll", "#adsm-interscroll", "#adnm-html-interscroll-frame-wrapper", "#topscroll", "#medium_rectangle_1", "#halfpage1", "#halfpage2", "#monster1", "#mediumrectangle2", "#halfpage3", "#monster2", "#halfpage4", "#monster3", "#monster4"], {
                "method": "placeholder",
                "tag": "script",
                "src": "https://z.moatads.com/politikendisplayxander409562178704/moatad.js"
              });
            });
            this.loaded = true;
          } else {
            jppolCMP.debug ? console.log('jppolCMP - "' + this.name + "' will not load") : null;
          }
        }
      },
    },
    init: function () {
      if (window.hasOwnProperty("jppolPerf") && window.jppolPerf.browserMeasureSupported) {
        window.performance.measure('jppolCmp:init:start');
      }
      
      for (var p in jppolCMP.vendors) {
        if (jppolCMP.vendors.hasOwnProperty(p)) {
          var v = jppolCMP.vendors[p];
          if (v.hasOwnProperty('load') && v.hasOwnProperty('loaded')) {
            if (v.loaded) {
              jppolCMP.debug ? console.log('Vendor: ', p, 'has already been loaded') : null;
            } else {
              v.load();
            }
          }
        }
      }
      
      jppolCMP.onReady(function () {
        for (var i = 0; i < jppolCMP.embeds.length; i++) {
          var embed = jppolCMP.embeds[i];
          if (embed.loaded) {
            jppolCMP.debug ? console.log('Embed with "id":', embed.id, 'has already been loaded') : null;
          } else {
            jppolCMP.createEmbed(embed.id, embed.html);
          }
        }

        
        
      });
    },
    onReady: function (callback) {
      if (typeof (callback) !== "function") {
        jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("jppolCMP.onReady - 'callback' in not a function:", typeof (callback)) : null;
        return false
      }
      if (/complete|interactive/.test(document.readyState)) {
        callback();
      } else {
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
          callback();
        });
      }
    },
    checkConsentByIds: function (array) {
      if (Array.isArray(array) && array.length === 0) {
        return true;
      }

      if (jppolCMP.tcfdata.hasOwnProperty('grants')) {
        var grants = jppolCMP.tcfdata.grants;

        
        var consentsFound = [];

        for (var i = 0; i < array.length; i++) {
          var id = array[i];
          if (grants.hasOwnProperty(id) && grants[id].hasOwnProperty('vendorGrant') && grants[id].vendorGrant) {
            jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("jppolCMP - tcfdata.grants['" + id + "'] FOUND", grants[id]) : null;
            consentsFound.push(id);
          } else {
            jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("jppolCMP - tcfdata.grants['" + id + "'] not found or false:", grants[id]) : null;
          }
        }

        
        if (consentsFound.length !== array.length) {
          if (jppolCMP.tcfdata.hasOwnProperty('customVendors')) {
            var cVendors = jppolCMP.tcfdata.customVendors;

            for (var i = 0; i < array.length; i++) {
              var id = array[i];

              for (var j = 0; j < cVendors.length; j++) {
                var vendor = cVendors[j];
                if (vendor.hasOwnProperty("_id") && vendor._id === id) {
                  jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("jppolCMP - tcfdata.customVendors with correct '_id' FOUND", vendor) : null;
                  consentsFound.push(id);
                }
              }

            }

          }
        }

        
        return (consentsFound.length === array.length);
      }

      jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("jppolCMP - 'tcfdata.grants' not found") : null;
      return false;
    },
    checkFullConsent: function () {
      if (jppolCMP.tcfdata.hasOwnProperty('grants')) {
        for (var p in jppolCMP.tcfdata.grants) {
          if (jppolCMP.tcfdata.grants.hasOwnProperty(p)) {
            var grant = jppolCMP.tcfdata.grants[p];
            if (!(grant.hasOwnProperty('vendorGrant') && grant.vendorGrant)) {
              return false;
            }
          }
        }
      }
      return true;
    },
    checkGoogleConsent: function () {
      if (jppolCMP.tcfdata.hasOwnProperty('purpose')) {
        if (jppolCMP.tcfdata.purpose.hasOwnProperty('consents')) {
          if (jppolCMP.tcfdata.purpose.consents[1]) {
            
          } else {
            return false;
          }
        }
      }

      if (jppolCMP.tcfdata.hasOwnProperty('vendor')) {
        if (jppolCMP.tcfdata.vendor.hasOwnProperty('consents')) {
          if (jppolCMP.tcfdata.vendor.consents[755]) {
            return true;
          }
        }
      }

      return false;
    },
    createScript: function (src, async, callback) {
      if (src !== null && typeof (src) !== "undefined") {
        var s = document.createElement("script");
        s.src = src;
        (async !== null && typeof (async) !== "undefined") ? s.async = (async === true) : false;
        if (typeof (callback) === "function") {
          s.onload = function () {
            callback();
            jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("jppolCMP - callback done:", src) : null;
          }
        }
        var t = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
        t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
        jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("jppolCMP - created script:", src) : null;
      } else {
        console.log("jppolCMP - 'src' is invalid");
      }
    },
    createEmbed: function (id, string) {
      var div = document.getElementById(id);
      if (div === null) {
        jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("jppolCMP - createEmbed() could not find element with 'id':", id) : null;
        return false;
      }

      var doc = new window.DOMParser().parseFromString(string, "text/html");

      var vendorSrc = doc.head.innerHTML.match(/[\s.]src="(.*?)"/i);
      if (typeof (vendorSrc) === "undefined" || vendorSrc === null) {
        vendorSrc = doc.body.innerHTML.match(/[\s.]src="(.*?)"/i);
      }

      if (vendorSrc && vendorSrc.length && vendorSrc.length > 1) {
        var str = vendorSrc[1].toLowerCase();

        
        if (/https?:\/\//.test(str) || /\/\//.test(str)) {

          var vendor = jppolCMP.findEmbedVendorsFromString(str);

          
          if (!vendor.hasOwnProperty('name')) {
            jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("jppolCMP - Could not find vendor using String 'str':", str) : null;
            div.innerHTML = jppolCMP.embedHtmlVendorNotFound();
            return false;
          }

          var valid = true;
          if (vendor.hasOwnProperty("required")) {
            valid = jppolCMP.checkConsentByIds(vendor.required);
          }

          
          if (!valid) {
            jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("jppolCMP - no consent for embed with 'id'", id, "found vendor:", vendor) : null;
            var name = "Embedded indhold";
            if (vendor.hasOwnProperty("name") && typeof (vendor.name) === "string") {
              name = vendor.name;
            }
            div.innerHTML = jppolCMP.embedHtmlNoConsent(name);
            return false;
          }
        }
          
        else if (str.indexOf("/webservice/etrack")) {
          var vendor = jppolCMP.findEmbedVendorsFromString(str);

          var valid = true;
          if (vendor.hasOwnProperty("required") && Array.isArray(vendor.required)) {
            valid = jppolCMP.checkConsentByIds(vendor.required);
          }

          if (valid) {
            div.innerHTML = string;
          }
          jppolCMP.debug ? console.log('jppolCMP - Embedded eTrack iframe') : null;
          return true;
        }
      } else {
        jppolCMP.debug ? console.log('jppolCMP - no "vendorSrc" found for "id":', id) : null;
      }

      
      var scripts = [];
      var i = 0;

      var headScripts = doc.head.getElementsByTagName('script');
      for (i = 0; i < headScripts.length; i++) {
        var s = headScripts[i];
        scripts.push({
          "src": s.src,
          "async": s.async,
          "code": (s.text || s.textContent || s.innerHTML || "")
        });
        s.remove();
      }

      var bodyScripts = doc.body.getElementsByTagName('script');
      for (i = 0; i < bodyScripts.length; i++) {
        var p = bodyScripts[i];
        scripts.push({
          "src": p.src,
          "async": p.async,
          "code": (p.text || p.textContent || p.innerHTML || "")
        });
        p.remove();
      }

      
      div.innerHTML = doc.body.innerHTML;
      jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("jppolCMP - creating scripts for id: ", id, scripts) : null;

      
      for (i = 0; i < scripts.length; i++) {
        var r = scripts[i];
        if (r.code !== "") {
          var newScript = document.createElement("script");
          newScript.appendChild(document.createTextNode(r.code));
          div.parentElement.insertBefore(newScript, div);
          jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("jppolCMP - created local-script for id: ", id) : null;
        } else {
          jppolCMP.createScript(r.src, r.async, function () {
            jppolCMP.debug ? console.log('jppolCMP - embedded script with "src":', r.src) : null;
          });
        }
      }

      
      for (i = 0; i < jppolCMP.embeds.length; i++) {
        var embed = jppolCMP.embeds[i];
        if (embed.id === id) {
          embed.loaded = true;
          break;
        }
      }
    },
    findEmbedVendorsFromString: function (string) {
      for (var p in jppolCMP.embedVendors) {
        if (jppolCMP.embedVendors.hasOwnProperty(p)) {

          var vendor = jppolCMP.embedVendors[p];
          if (vendor.hasOwnProperty("sources")) {

            var src = vendor.sources;
            if (Array.isArray(src)) {
              for (var i = 0; i < src.length; i++) {
                if (string.indexOf(src[i]) !== -1) {
                  return vendor;
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
      return {};
    },
    removeHtmlCollection: function (htmlCollection) {
      if (htmlCollection.length > 0) {
        for (var i = (htmlCollection.length - 1); i > -1; i--) {
          htmlCollection[i].remove();
          // TODO: create polyfill: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/ChildNode/remove
        }
      }
    },
    checkShowCookieWall: function () {
      if (!jppolCMP.fullConsent) {
        if (window.hasOwnProperty("polContext__") && window.polContext__.hasOwnProperty("page") && window.polContext__.hasOwnProperty("user")) {
          
          if (window.polContext__.page.hasOwnProperty('articleId')) {
            if (jppolCMP.cookieWallArticleBlacklist.indexOf(window.polContext__.page.articleId) !== -1) {
              return false;
            }
          }

          
          if (!window.polContext__.user.hasOwnProperty("isPayingCustomer") || !window.polContext__.user.isPayingCustomer) {
            
            if (window.polContext__.page.hasOwnProperty("contentType") && window.polContext__.page.contentType === "article") {
              
              if (!window.polContext__.page.hasOwnProperty("isPremium") || !window.polContext__.page.isPremium) {
                return true;
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
      return false;
    },
    initCookieWall: function () {
      if (!jppolCMP.checkShowCookieWall()) {
        jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("jppolCMP - checkShowCookieWall is false") : null;
        return false;
      }

      var version = "js-cookiewall-a";
      var wall = document.getElementsByClassName("js-cookiewall-a");
      var wallCopy = document.getElementsByClassName("js-cookiewall-copy");

      if (wall.length === 0) {
        jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("jppolCMP - could not find element with class:", version) : null;
        return false;
      }
      if (wallCopy.length > 0) {
        jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("jppolCMP - 'wallCopy' already exists:", wallCopy) : null;
        return false;
      }

      var isMobile = (window.hasOwnProperty("polContext__") && window.polContext__.hasOwnProperty("page") && window.polContext__.page.hasOwnProperty("deviceType") && window.polContext__.page.deviceType === "mobile");
      var childNodeCount = isMobile ? 8 : 10;

      var article = document.getElementsByClassName("article")[0];
      if (!article) {
        return false;
      }

      
      window.addEventListener("click", function (event) {
        var t = event.target;
        var cl = t.classList;
        if (cl.contains("js-cookie-wall-button")) {
          var data = t.dataset;
          window.dataLayer.push({
            event: "cookieStop",
            cookie_stop_click: {
              click_action: data.type,
              ab_version: data.version
            }
          });
        }
      });

      
      jppolCMP.removeHtmlCollection(article.getElementsByClassName("article-related"));
      jppolCMP.removeHtmlCollection(article.getElementsByClassName("article-bottom"));

      
      jppolCMP.removeHtmlCollection(document.getElementsByClassName("readinglist-notification"));

      
      var articleBodys = article.getElementsByClassName('article__body');
      for (var i = (articleBodys.length - 1); i > -1; i--) {
        var part = articleBodys[i];

        
        if (i === 0) {
          
          jppolCMP.removeHtmlCollection(part.getElementsByClassName("js-audio-trigger"));
          jppolCMP.removeHtmlCollection(part.getElementsByClassName("ad__inline"));
          jppolCMP.removeHtmlCollection(part.getElementsByClassName("body__external"));

          
          var childNodes = part.childNodes;
          while (childNodes.length > childNodeCount) {
            childNodes[childNodes.length - 1].remove();
          }

        } else {
          part.remove();
        }
      }

      
      var articleSections = article.getElementsByClassName('article__section');
      for (var i = (articleSections.length - 1); i > -1; i--) {
        
        if (i === 0 || i === 1) {
          continue;
        }
        articleSections[i].remove();
      }

      if (articleSections[1]) {
        if (articleBodys[0]) {
          articleSections[1].style.maxHeight = articleBodys[0].offsetHeight + "px";
          
          if (isMobile) {
            articleSections[1].style.overflow = "hidden";
          } else {
            articleSections[1].style.overflow = "visible";
            articleSections[1].style.zIndex = "0";
            articleSections[1].style.position = "relative";
          }
        }
      }

      
      var articleSupers = article.getElementsByClassName('body__super-element');
      for (var i = (articleSupers.length - 1); i > -1; i--) {
        
        if (i === 0) {
          continue;
        }
        articleSupers[i].remove();
      }

      
      window.dataLayer.push({
        event: 'template-ab-testing',
        abtest: {
          testcase: "CookiePayWall",
          testscenario: version
        }
      });

      
      jppolCMP.reloadPageOnFullConsent = true;

      
      var copy = wall[0].cloneNode(true);
      copy.classList.add("js-cookiewall-copy");
      copy.classList.remove("u-hidden");

      

      var cookieWallStickyContainer = "<div class='cookiewall--sticky-container'>" + copy.outerHTML + "</div>";
      var stickyScrollSpace = 350;
      article.insertAdjacentHTML("beforeend", cookieWallStickyContainer);

      var articleElement = document.querySelector('article.article');

      
      document.querySelector('.main').style.overflowX = 'unset';
      articleElement.style.overflow = 'visible';
      articleElement.style.position = 'relative';

      
      cookieWallStickyContainer = document.querySelector('.cookiewall--sticky-container');
      cookieWallStickyContainer.style.height = (cookieWallStickyContainer.clientHeight + stickyScrollSpace) + 'px';

      if (isMobile) {
        articleElement.querySelector('section').style.setProperty('margin-bottom', stickyScrollSpace + 'px', 'important');
      } else {
        cookieWallStickyContainer.style.marginTop = stickyScrollSpace * -1 + 'px';
        var prevSibling = cookieWallStickyContainer.previousElementSibling;
        if (prevSibling && prevSibling.classList.contains('container')) {
          prevSibling.style.zIndex = 'auto';
        }
      }

    },
    openSourcePointMessage: function () {
      if (window._sp_) {
        if (window._sp_.executeMessaging) {
          window._sp_.config.targetingParams = {showMessageAlways: "true"};
          window._sp_.executeMessaging();
        } else {
          window._sp_.loadPrivacyManagerModal(161135);
        }
      } else {
        jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("jppolCMP - 'window._sp_' not found", window._sp_) : null;
      }
    }
  };
  </script>
  <script>
   __tcfapi('addEventListener', 2, (tcData, success) => {
    if (tcData.hasOwnProperty('tcString')) {
      jppolCMP.tcfdata.tcString = tcData.tcString;
    }
    if (tcData.hasOwnProperty('purpose')) {
      jppolCMP.tcfdata.purpose = tcData.purpose;
    }
    if (tcData.hasOwnProperty('vendor')) {
      jppolCMP.tcfdata.vendor = tcData.vendor;
    }

    if (success) {
      if (window.hasOwnProperty("jppolPerf") && window.jppolPerf.browserMeasureSupported) {
        window.performance.measure('jppolCmp:tcf:success');
      }

      if (tcData.eventStatus === 'tcloaded' || tcData.eventStatus === 'useractioncomplete') {
        __tcfapi('getCustomVendorConsents', 2, (data) => {
          if (window.hasOwnProperty("jppolPerf") && window.jppolPerf.browserMeasureSupported) {
            window.performance.measure('jppolCmp:tcf:customVendorConsents');
          }

          if (data) {
            if (data.hasOwnProperty("consentedVendors")) {
              jppolCMP.tcfdata.customVendors = data.consentedVendors;
            }
            if (data.hasOwnProperty('grants')) {
              jppolCMP.tcfdata.grants = data.grants;
            }

            
            jppolCMP.googleConsent = jppolCMP.checkGoogleConsent();

            
            jppolCMP.fullConsent = jppolCMP.checkFullConsent();

            
            if (window.ReactNativeWebView) {
              if (jppolCMP.fullConsent) {
                window.ReactNativeWebView.postMessage(JSON.stringify({
                  href: window.location.href,
                  type: 'FULL_CONSENT',
                  page: window.polContext__.page,
                }));
              } else {
                window.ReactNativeWebView.postMessage(JSON.stringify({
                  href: window.location.href,
                  type: 'LIMITED_CONSENT',
                  page: window.polContext__.page,
                }));
              }
            }

            
            if (jppolCMP.fullConsent && jppolCMP.reloadPageOnFullConsent) {
              window.location.reload();
            }
          }
          jppolCMP.init();
          if (window.hasOwnProperty("jppolPerf") && window.jppolPerf.browserMeasureSupported) {
            window.performance.measure('jppolCmp:init:end');
          }
        });
      } else {
        jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("jppolCMP - unknown eventStatus:", tcData.eventStatus) : null;
      }
    } else {
      jppolCMP.debug ? console.log("success = false, no scripts will be initialized") : null;
    }
  });
  </script>

     <h2 class="ui-font--bold u-padding--top-normal u-padding--bottom-half ui-font--theme">
      Du har ingen artikler på din læseliste
     </h2>
     <div class="ui-font u-padding--vertical-small">
      Hvis du ser en artikel, du gerne vil læse lidt senere, kan du klikke på dette ikon
      <span class="save-follow-icon ui-font--xXlarge save-article-icon--empty ui-font--theme">
       <svg class="save-article-icon" fill="none" height="15" viewbox="0 0 9 15" width="9" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

        </path>

        </path>
        <path class="save-article-icon--read" d="M0 6.50322L1.125 5.26755L3.5625 7.92425L7.875 3.1875L9 4.40258L3.54375 10.375L0 6.50322Z" fill="currentColor">
        </path>

        </path>
       </svg>
       <span class="save-article__clicktarget">
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <div class="ui-font u-padding--vertical-small">

  <aside class="js-follow-popup-onboarding save-onboarding-modal modal modal--medium ui-font ui-font--medium ui-font--theme">
   <span class="pol-info-modal__close icon icon--close--theme js-follow-popup-onboarding-close">
   </span>
   <h2 class="save-onboarding-modal__header ui-font u-text--uppercase">
    Sådan
    <span class="ui-font--bold">
     følger du
    </span>
   </h2>
   <h4 class="save-onboarding-modal__summary">
    Følg et emne eller en skribent og vær sikker på, du får det hele med.
   </h4>
   <ul>
    <li class="save-onboarding-modal__bullet">
     <span class="save-onboarding-modal__icon">
      <svg fill="none" height="40" viewbox="0 0 40 40" width="40" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
       <path clip-rule="evenodd" d="M16.7165 16.7165V0H23.2835V16.7165H40V23.2835H23.2835V40H16.7165V23.2835H0V16.7165H16.7165Z" fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd">
       </path>
      </svg>
     </span>
     <p class="save-onboarding-modal__bullet-text">
      Klik på
      <span class="follow-onboarding-span u-display--inline-block u-cursor--default u-padding--half">
       <span class="follow-svg--plus u-display--inline-block ui-font--theme">
        <svg viewbox="0 0 15 15" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
         <path d="M7.49976 0V15M15 7.50031H0" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="3">
         </path>
        </svg>
       </span>
       <span class="ui-font ui-font--black u-text--uppercase">
        Følg
       </span>
      </span>
      ud for et tag eller en skribent
     </p>
    </li>
    <li class="save-onboarding-modal__bullet">
     <span class="save-onboarding-modal__icon">

         <a class="topband-item__link u-flex--align-self-center" href="https://politiken.dk/kultur/boger/art8119965/Det-overrasker-mig-at-et-af-de-bedste-r%C3%A5d-handler-om-tandtr%C3%A5d">
          <span class="headline--theme">
           Bente Klarlund er glad for ny bog om at opnå et langt liv:
          </span>
          Det overrasker mig, at et af de bedste råd handler om tandtråd
         </a>
        </li>
        <li class="topband-item js-topbar-nav__item headline headline--xxxsmall card u-flex u-bg--white u-text--left">
         <div class="topband-item__image u-flex--no-shrink u-margin--right-half">

           </div>
          </figure>
         </div>

          <span class="headline--theme">
           Nyt job:
          </span>
          Politisk kommentator Kristian Madsen forlader Politiken
         </a>

          Her er de nyeste tal for coronavirus i Danmark

        <article class="teaser teaser--default card faux-block-link" data-access-reference="article-teaser_default" data-category="topNarrow" data-element-type="article">
         <div class="article-intro">
          <a data-prefetchable="true" href="https://politiken.dk/indland/art8144297/%C2%BBDer-er-flere-der-fors%C3%B8ger-sig-med-kreative-%E2%80%99fiksfakserier%E2%80%99-som-det-vi-ser-her%C2%AB">
           <div class="article-intro__image">
            <figure class="media">
             <div class="media__wrapper media__wrapper--p3x2 media__wrapper--gray" style="">
              <img alt="Joachim Adrian" class="media__image image--fullwidth" sizes="(max-width: 960px) 750px, (max-width: 1117px) 750px, 750px" srcset="https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8144334.f67gpm/ALTERNATES/p3x2_750/Case%20Familie%20der%20handler%20dagligvarer%20over%20nettet 750w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8144334.f67gpm/ALTERNATES/p3x2_750/Case%20Familie%20der%20handler%20dagligvarer%20over%20nettet 750w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8144334.f67gpm/ALTERNATES/p3x2_750/Case%20Familie%20der%20handler%20dagligvarer%20over%20nettet 750w" title="Joachim Adrian"/>
             </div>
            </figure>
           </div>
          </a>
          <div class="article-intro__text">
           <h2 class="article-intro__title headline headline--xxxlarge">
            <a class="faux-block-link__promote" data-prefetchable="true" href="https://politiken.dk/indland/art8144297/%C2%BBDer-er-flere-der-fors%C3%B8ger-sig-med-kreative-%E2%80%99fiksfakserier%E2%80%99-som-det-vi-ser-her%C2%AB">
             <span class="article-intro__trumpet headline--theme">
              Minister tager sig til hovedet efter afsløringer om Nemlig.com:
             </span>
            </a>

              <ul class="save-follow-list save-follow-list--inline ui-font--theme">

            <div class="media__wrapper media__wrapper--bg media__wrapper--gray" style="">

           <div class="article-intro--bg__top">
            <h2 class="article-intro__title ui-font ui-font--bold ui-font--xXlarge ui-font--white">
             Dagens quiz:
            </h2>
            <h3 class="article-intro__summary article-intro__summary--mt--small ui-font ui-font--large ui-font--white">
            </h3>
            <p class="article-intro__summary__p">
             I hvilken dansk by findes domkirken Budolfi Kirke?
            </p>
            <a class="article-intro__btn faux-block-link__promote btn btn--sales btn--medium" data-link-type="digitalsale" href="https://politiken.dk/partnersites/bezzerwizzer/">
             Tag quizzen
            </a>
           </div>

         </div>
        </article>
        <article class="teaser teaser--default card faux-block-link" data-access-reference="article-teaser_default" data-category="small" data-element-type="article">
         <div class="article-intro">
          <a data-prefetchable="true" href="https://politiken.dk/kultur/boger/art8128135/Den-ene-var-prisvindende-forfatter-den-anden-en-n%C3%A5desl%C3%B8s-bogslagter-Ny-bog-fort%C3%A6ller-om-fjendskab-og-beundring-mellem-to-mastodonter">
           <div class="article-intro__image">
            <figure class="media">
             <div class="media__wrapper media__wrapper--p3x2 media__wrapper--gray" style="">
              <img class="media__image image--fullwidth js-lazyload-image lazyload-image" data-sizes="(max-width: 960px) 300px, (max-width: 1117px) 300px, 300px" data-srcset="https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8137956.diojrd/ALTERNATES/p3x2_300/Kultur_4%20Pol_Kultur%2017-03-2021%20Lands%201udg 300w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8137956.diojrd/ALTERNATES/p3x2_300/Kultur_4%20Pol_Kultur%2017-03-2021%20Lands%201udg 300w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8137956.diojrd/ALTERNATES/p3x2_300/Kultur_4%20Pol_Kultur%2017-03-2021%20Lands%201udg 300w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="/>
             </div>
            </figure>
           </div>
          </a>
          <div class="article-intro__text">
           <h2 class="article-intro__title headline headline--large">
            <a class="faux-block-link__promote" data-prefetchable="true" href="https://politiken.dk/kultur/boger/art8128135/Den-ene-var-prisvindende-forfatter-den-anden-en-n%C3%A5desl%C3%B8s-bogslagter-Ny-bog-fort%C3%A6ller-om-fjendskab-og-beundring-mellem-to-mastodonter">
             Den ene var prisvindende forfatter, den anden en nådesløs bogslagter: Ny bog fortæller om fjendskab og beundring mellem to mastodonter
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="save-follow-list u-margin--top-xsmall ui-font--theme">
            <li class="save-follow-list-item ui-font--theme">
             <a class="ui-font--theme" href="https://politiken.dk/kultur/boger/">
              Bøger
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="save-follow-list-item save-follow-list-item--premium">
             <span class="save-follow-premium icon icon--premium icon--premium--theme inline-icon ui-font ui-font--theme">
             </span>
            </li>
            <li class="save-follow-list-item save-article js-save-article" data-article-id="8128135" data-read="false" data-saved="false">
             <button class="save-follow-icon ui-font--theme">

           <div class="u-flex--grow">
            <h2 class="article-intro__title ui-font ui-font--bold ui-font--xXlarge">
             E-avisen
            </h2>
            <h3 class="article-intro__summary article-intro__summary--mt--small ui-font ui-font--gray-dark ui-font--large">
            </h3>
            <p class="article-intro__summary__p">
             De danske børn i de syriske fangelejre er blevet et problem, Mette Frederiksen og Danmark ikke kan komme af med. Essay af Politikens Bo Søndergaard, som besøgte lejrene i 2019.
            </p>
           </div>
           <a class="article-intro__btn article-intro__btn--center faux-block-link__promote btn btn--sales btn--medium" data-link-type="digitalsale" href="https://politiken.dk/eavis">
            Læs e-avisen
           </a>

             Se alle aviser siden 1884 i vores
             <a class="article-intro__a--underline faux-block-link__promote" href="/arkiv/avisarkiv/" rel="Follow" target="_self">
              avisarkiv
             </a>
             .
            </p>
           </footer>
          </div>

              5 hjerter til nyt album:
             </span>
            </a>
            <a class="faux-block-link__promote" data-prefetchable="false" href="https://politiken.dk/kultur/musik/art8136567/Ballade-kaos-og-vrede-omgiver-altid-Lana-Del-Rey.-Men-hun-bliver-bare-ved-med-at-lave-narkotisk-pop">
             Ballade, kaos og vrede omgiver altid Lana Del Rey. Men hun bliver bare ved med at lave narkotisk pop
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="save-follow-list u-margin--top-xsmall ui-font--theme">
            <li class="save-follow-list-item ui-font--theme">
             <a class="ui-font--theme" href="https://politiken.dk/kultur/musik/">

             </a>
            </li>

             </span>
            </li>
            <li class="save-follow-list-item save-article js-save-article" data-article-id="8136567" data-read="false" data-saved="false">
             <button class="save-follow-icon ui-font--theme">
              <svg class="save-article-icon" fill="none" height="15" viewbox="0 0 9 15" width="9" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
               <path class="save-article-icon--not-bookmarked" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M0 15V0H9V15L4.5 10.5333L0 15ZM1 11.0544L4.5 7.67097L8 11.0544V1.00494H1V11.0544Z" fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd">
               </path>
               <path class="save-article-icon--bookmarked" d="M0 15V0H9V15L4.5 10.5L0 15Z" fill="currentColor">
               </path>
               <path class="save-article-icon--read" d="M0 6.50322L1.125 5.26755L3.5625 7.92425L7.875 3.1875L9 4.40258L3.54375 10.375L0 6.50322Z" fill="currentColor">

            <a href="https://politiken.dk/annoncoerbetaltindhold/Toyota/art8106523/Ambassad%C3%B8rer-royale-og-statsoverhoveder-str%C3%B8mmer-til-Sams%C3%B8-for-at-f%C3%A5-b%C3%A6redygtige-r%C3%A5d">

          <div class="article-intro__text">

     <div class="container container--dynamic u-bg--gray js-lazyload-image-container">
      <div class="row u-clearfix">
       <ul class="col col--sm-3 col--md-3 col--lg-4">
        <article class="teaser teaser--default card faux-block-link" data-access-reference="article-teaser_default" data-category="small" data-element-type="article">
         <div class="article-intro">
          <a data-prefetchable="true" href="https://politiken.dk/forbrugogliv/sundhedogmotion/art8144373/Ministerium-n%C3%A6gter-at-udlevere-minknotat-%C2%BBJeg-synes-at-det-er-temmelig-problematisk%C2%AB">

            <figure class="media">
             <div class="media__wrapper media__wrapper--p3x2 media__wrapper--gray" style="">
              <img alt="Philip Davali/Ritzau Scanpix" class="media__image image--fullwidth js-lazyload-image lazyload-image" data-sizes="(max-width: 960px) 300px, (max-width: 1117px) 300px, 300px" data-srcset="https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8144399.h2rjrr/ALTERNATES/p3x2_300/%C3%85bent%20samr%C3%A5d%20om%20prioritering%20af%20vaccinationer%20med%20Magnus%20Heunicke%20S 300w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8144399.h2rjrr/ALTERNATES/p3x2_300/%C3%85bent%20samr%C3%A5d%20om%20prioritering%20af%20vaccinationer%20med%20Magnus%20Heunicke%20S 300w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8144399.h2rjrr/ALTERNATES/p3x2_300/%C3%85bent%20samr%C3%A5d%20om%20prioritering%20af%20vaccinationer%20med%20Magnus%20Heunicke%20S 300w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" title="Philip Davali/Ritzau Scanpix"/>

          <div class="article-intro__text article-intro__text--no-padding">
           <div class="article-intro__tag-container article-intro__tag-container--theme faux-block-link__promote article-intro__tag-container--pulled-up">
            <a class="article-intro__tag tag tag--small u-ellipsis tag--theme" href="https://politiken.dk/tag/main/Virusudbrud">
             Coronavirus
            </a>
           </div>
           <h2 class="article-intro__title headline headline--large">
            <a class="faux-block-link__promote" data-prefetchable="true" href="https://politiken.dk/forbrugogliv/sundhedogmotion/art8144373/Ministerium-n%C3%A6gter-at-udlevere-minknotat-%C2%BBJeg-synes-at-det-er-temmelig-problematisk%C2%AB">
             Ministerium nægter at udlevere minknotat: »Jeg synes, at det er temmelig problematisk«
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="save-follow-list u-margin--top-xsmall ui-font--theme">
            <li class="save-follow-list-item ui-font--theme">
             <a class="ui-font--theme" href="https://politiken.dk/forbrugogliv/sundhedogmotion/">
              Sundhed
             </a>
            </li>

           <div class="article-intro__image">
            <figure class="media">
             <div class="media__wrapper media__wrapper--p3x2 media__wrapper--gray" style="">
              <img alt="Jacob Ehrbahn/Jacob Ehrbahn" class="media__image image--fullwidth js-lazyload-image lazyload-image" data-sizes="(max-width: 960px) 450px, (max-width: 1117px) 615px, 750px" data-srcset="https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8141823.s2zchn/ALTERNATES/p3x2_450/PS%20COVERBUD 450w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8141823.s2zchn/ALTERNATES/p3x2_615/PS%20COVERBUD 615w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8141823.s2zchn/ALTERNATES/p3x2_750/PS%20COVERBUD 750w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" title="Jacob Ehrbahn/Jacob Ehrbahn"/>

           <div class="article-intro__tag-container article-intro__tag-container--theme faux-block-link__promote article-intro__tag-container--pulled-up">
            <a class="article-intro__tag tag tag--small u-ellipsis tag--theme" href="https://politiken.dk/tag/main/Drømmen_om_Europa">
             Drømmen om Europa
            </a>
           </div>
           <h2 class="article-intro__title headline headline--xxlarge">
            <a class="faux-block-link__promote" data-prefetchable="false" href="https://politiken.dk/fotografier/art8138587/Hvis-du-hiver-religion-og-politik-ud-af-det-her-og-ser-folk-i-%C3%B8jenh%C3%B8jde-t%C3%A6nker-du-Hvad-nu-hvis-det-var-mig">
             <span class="article-intro__trumpet headline--theme">
              Vi vendte historien på hovedet:
             </span>
            </a>
            <a class="faux-block-link__promote" data-prefetchable="false" href="https://politiken.dk/fotografier/art8138587/Hvis-du-hiver-religion-og-politik-ud-af-det-her-og-ser-folk-i-%C3%B8jenh%C3%B8jde-t%C3%A6nker-du-Hvad-nu-hvis-det-var-mig">
             Måske er det historien, at der intet er sket
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="save-follow-list u-margin--top-xsmall ui-font--theme">

         <div class="article-intro">
          <div class="article-intro__text">
           <blockquote class="quote quote--large icon icon--quote--theme">
            <h2 class="quote__body">
            </h2>
            <p class="quote__p">
             Det handler både om sexisme, racisme, chikane og meget andet, og det har udviklet sig til fuldstændigt vanvittige og uberettigede kommentarer
            </p>
            <h2 class="quote__footer ui-font ui-font--gray ui-font--bold">
            </h2>
            <p class="quote__p">
             Pernille Holbøll, ansvarshavende chefredaktør på Ekstra Bladet, der nu lukker kommentarspor
            </p>
           </blockquote>

           <figure class="media">
            <div class="media__wrapper media__wrapper--p3x2 media__wrapper--gray" style="">
             <img class="media__image image--fullwidth js-lazyload-image lazyload-image" data-sizes="(max-width: 960px) 450px, (max-width: 1117px) 615px, 750px" data-srcset="https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8137236.7q9f0r/ALTERNATES/p3x2_450/The_angel_of_death_striking_a_door_during_the_plague_of_Rome_Wellcome_V0010664%201 450w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8137236.7q9f0r/ALTERNATES/p3x2_615/The_angel_of_death_striking_a_door_during_the_plague_of_Rome_Wellcome_V0010664%201 615w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8137236.7q9f0r/ALTERNATES/p3x2_750/The_angel_of_death_striking_a_door_during_the_plague_of_Rome_Wellcome_V0010664%201 750w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="/>

          <div class="article-intro__text u-flex--grow">
           <div class="u-flex--grow">
            <h2 class="article-intro__title ui-font ui-font--bold ui-font--xxXlarge">
             I antikkens Rom blev epidemier og andre usædvanlige fænomener opfattet som ugunstige varsler
            </h2>
            <h3 class="article-intro__summary article-intro__summary--mt--small ui-font ui-font--gray-dark ui-font--large">
            </h3>
            <p class="article-intro__summary__p">
             Akkurat som vore dages coronakrise udlægges som et varselsskud fra en overbelastet og trængt natur, blev epidemier i det gamle Rom opfattet som et varsel om gudernes utilfredshed med menneskets adfærd.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <a class="faux-block-link__overlay" data-link-type="digitalsale" href="https://politikenhistorie.dk/art7804405/Epidemier-og-andre-varsler-i-antikkens-Rom?promo_name=hist-15-marts&amp;promo_id=ph&amp;promo_creative=artikel-epidemier-og-andre-varsler&amp;promo_position=shuffle&amp;utm_campaign=hist-15-marts&amp;utm_source=pol&amp;utm_medium=display&amp;utm_content=artikel-epidemier-og-andre-varsler" tabindex="-1">
         </a>
        </article>
        <article class="teaser teaser--default card faux-block-link" data-access-reference="article-teaser_default" data-category="large" data-element-type="article">

         <div class="article-intro">
          <a data-prefetchable="true" href="https://politiken.dk/udland/art8143677/Mineselskab-Gr%C3%B8nlandske-myndigheder-var-patetiske-fordomsfyldte-lunefulde-og-ukvalificerede">
           <div class="article-intro__image">
            <figure class="media">
             <div class="media__wrapper media__wrapper--p3x2 media__wrapper--gray" style="">
              <img alt="Valdemar Ren" class="media__image image--fullwidth js-lazyload-image lazyload-image" data-sizes="(max-width: 960px) 450px, (max-width: 1117px) 615px, 750px" data-srcset="https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8143905.ubg0wt/ALTERNATES/p3x2_450/Politiken 450w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8143905.ubg0wt/ALTERNATES/p3x2_615/Politiken 615w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8143905.ubg0wt/ALTERNATES/p3x2_750/Politiken 750w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" title="Valdemar Ren"/>
             </div>
            </figure>
           </div>
          </a>
          <div class="article-intro__text">
           <h2 class="article-intro__title headline headline--xxlarge">
            <a class="faux-block-link__promote" data-prefetchable="true" href="https://politiken.dk/udland/art8143677/Mineselskab-Gr%C3%B8nlandske-myndigheder-var-patetiske-fordomsfyldte-lunefulde-og-ukvalificerede">
             Mineselskab: Grønlandske myndig­heder var patetiske, fordoms­fyldte, lunefulde og ukvalificerede
            </a>
           </h2>
           <h3 class="article-intro__summary summary summary--medium">
           </h3>
           <p class="summary__p">
            Greenland Minerals lagde i 2019 et helt usædvanligt hårdt pres på de grønlandske myndigheder i sagen om miljøgodkendelse af den planlagte mine i Kvanefjeld i Sydgrønland. I dag er minen et vigtigt emne i den grønlandske valgkamp.
           </p>
           <ul class="save-follow-list u-margin--top-xsmall ui-font--theme">
            <li class="save-follow-list-item ui-font--theme">
             <a class="ui-font--theme" href="https://politiken.dk/udland/">
              Internationalt
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="save-follow-list-item save-follow-list-item--premium">
             <span class="save-follow-premium icon icon--premium icon--premium--theme inline-icon ui-font ui-font--theme">
             </span>
             <span class="save-follow-text ui-font--theme">
              For Abonnenter
             </span>
            </li>
            <li class="save-follow-list-item save-article js-save-article" data-article-id="8143677" data-read="false" data-saved="false">
             <button class="save-follow-icon ui-font--theme">
              <svg class="save-article-icon" fill="none" height="15" viewbox="0 0 9 15" width="9" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
               <path class="save-article-icon--not-bookmarked" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M0 15V0H9V15L4.5 10.5333L0 15ZM1 11.0544L4.5 7.67097L8 11.0544V1.00494H1V11.0544Z" fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd">
               </path>
               <path class="save-article-icon--bookmarked" d="M0 15V0H9V15L4.5 10.5L0 15Z" fill="currentColor">
               </path>
               <path class="save-article-icon--read" d="M0 6.50322L1.125 5.26755L3.5625 7.92425L7.875 3.1875L9 4.40258L3.54375 10.375L0 6.50322Z" fill="currentColor">
               </path>
               <path class="save-article-icon--remove" d="M9 11.1L8.08125 12L4.48125 8.41875L0.9 12L0 11.1L3.58125 7.5L0 3.9L0.9 3L4.48125 6.58125L8.08125 3L9 3.9L5.4 7.48125L9 11.1Z" fill="currentColor">
               </path>
              </svg>
              <span class="save-article__clicktarget">
              </span>
             </button>
             <span class="save-follow-text ui-font--theme">
              Læs Senere
             </span>
            </li>
           </ul>
           <ul class="article-intro__related">

       <div class="container container--dynamic">
        <div class="article-intro--bg__content article-intro--bg__content--padding-medium">
         <div class="row row--justify-start">
          <div class="article-intro--bg__top col col--6 col--overflow">
           <div class="article-intro__link">
            <h2 class="article-intro__title headline headline--mega headline--white">
             Da hele verden lukkede ned, gik Dua Lipa kontra
            </h2>
            <h3 class="article-intro__summary article-intro__summary--padding-medium article-intro__summary--mt--large summary summary--medium summary--white">
            </h3>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="col col--6">
          <ul class="save-follow-list u-margin--top-xsmall u-margin--bottom-normal u-flex--justify-content-center faux-block-link__promote ui-font--white">
           <li class="save-follow-list-item ui-font--white">
            <a class="ui-font--white" href="https://politiken.dk/kultur/musik/">
             Musik
            </a>
           </li>
           <li class="save-follow-list-item save-follow-list-item--premium save-follow-list-item--white">
            <span class="save-follow-premium icon icon--premium icon--premium--theme inline-icon ui-font ui-font--white">
            </span>
           </li>
           <li class="save-follow-list-item save-article js-save-article save-follow-list-item--white" data-article-id="8059819" data-read="false" data-saved="false">
            <button class="save-follow-icon ui-font--white">
             <svg class="save-article-icon" fill="none" height="15" viewbox="0 0 9 15" width="9" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
              <path class="save-article-icon--not-bookmarked" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M0 15V0H9V15L4.5 10.5333L0 15ZM1 11.0544L4.5 7.67097L8 11.0544V1.00494H1V11.0544Z" fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd">
              </path>
              <path class="save-article-icon--bookmarked" d="M0 15V0H9V15L4.5 10.5L0 15Z" fill="currentColor">
              </path>

       </div>
      </div>

     </article>
    </section>

          <div class="article-intro__text">
           <h2 class="article-intro__title headline headline--large">
            <a class="faux-block-link__promote" data-prefetchable="true" href="https://politiken.dk/sport/art8144282/Axelsen-m%C3%A5-b%C3%B8je-sig-i-k%C3%A6mpe-finale-med-historisk-indslag">
             Axelsen må bøje sig i kæmpe finale med historisk indslag
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="save-follow-list u-margin--top-xsmall ui-font--theme">
            <li class="save-follow-list-item ui-font--theme">
             <a class="ui-font--theme" href="https://politiken.dk/sport/">
              Sport
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="save-follow-list-item save-article js-save-article" data-article-id="8144282" data-read="false" data-saved="false">
             <button class="save-follow-icon ui-font--theme">
              <svg class="save-article-icon" fill="none" height="15" viewbox="0 0 9 15" width="9" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
               <path class="save-article-icon--not-bookmarked" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M0 15V0H9V15L4.5 10.5333L0 15ZM1 11.0544L4.5 7.67097L8 11.0544V1.00494H1V11.0544Z" fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd">
               </path>
               <path class="save-article-icon--bookmarked" d="M0 15V0H9V15L4.5 10.5L0 15Z" fill="currentColor">
               </path>
               <path class="save-article-icon--read" d="M0 6.50322L1.125 5.26755L3.5625 7.92425L7.875 3.1875L9 4.40258L3.54375 10.375L0 6.50322Z" fill="currentColor">
               </path>
               <path class="save-article-icon--remove" d="M9 11.1L8.08125 12L4.48125 8.41875L0.9 12L0 11.1L3.58125 7.5L0 3.9L0.9 3L4.48125 6.58125L8.08125 3L9 3.9L5.4 7.48125L9 11.1Z" fill="currentColor">
               </path>
              </svg>

           <div class="u-flex--grow">
            <h2 class="article-intro__title ui-font ui-font--bold ui-font--xXlarge">
             <span class="article-intro__trumpet ui-font--theme">
              Bliv klogere på hverdagslivet:
             </span>
             Få brev fra Sarah Skarum hver fredag
            </h2>
            <h3 class="article-intro__summary article-intro__summary--mt--small ui-font ui-font--gray-dark ui-font--large">
            </h3>
            <p class="article-intro__summary__p">
             Sarah Skarum skriver om mad, relationer, tendenser, eksistens og livet på den anden side af 40 (som faktisk er ret sjovt!), og du kan få det direkte i indbakken hver fredag.
            </p>
           </div>
           <a class="article-intro__btn article-intro__btn--center faux-block-link__promote btn btn--sales btn--medium" data-link-type="digitalsale" href="https://politiken.dk/nyhedsbreve/mine/nyhedsbrev_-_fredagsbrevet/?promo_name=nyhedsbrev-fredagsbrevet&amp;promo_id=ma&amp;promo_creative=nyhedsbrev-fredagsbrevet&amp;promo_position=shuffle">
            Tilmeld dig her
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>

         </a>
        </article>

          <div class="article-intro__text">
           <h2 class="article-intro__title headline headline--large">
            <a class="faux-block-link__promote" data-prefetchable="false" href="https://politiken.dk/kultur/boger/art8054930/N%C3%A5r-m%C3%B8rket-falder-p%C3%A5-er-du-stadig-mor">
             <span class="article-intro__trumpet headline--theme">
              Lise Garsdal:
             </span>
            </a>
            <a class="faux-block-link__promote" data-prefetchable="false" href="https://politiken.dk/kultur/boger/art8054930/N%C3%A5r-m%C3%B8rket-falder-p%C3%A5-er-du-stadig-mor">
             Det er en hvid privilegeret kvindes måske sidste kraft­anstrengelse – lige inden mørket trækker sig sammen
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="save-follow-list u-margin--top-xsmall ui-font--theme">
            <li class="save-follow-list-item ui-font--theme">
             <a class="ui-font--theme" href="https://politiken.dk/kultur/boger/">
              Bøger
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="save-follow-list-item save-follow-list-item--premium">

          <div class="article-intro__text u-flex--grow">
           <div class="u-flex--grow">
            <h2 class="article-intro__title ui-font ui-font--bold ui-font--xXlarge">
             <span class="article-intro__trumpet ui-font--theme">
              Kender du
             </span>
             en lærer, der fortjener at blive hyldet?
            </h2>
            <h3 class="article-intro__summary article-intro__summary--mt--small ui-font ui-font--gray-dark ui-font--large">
            </h3>
            <p class="article-intro__summary__p">
             Politiken og Villum Fonden hylder de dygtigste og mest dedikerede lærere i Danmark. Indstil din kandidat nu.
            </p>
           </div>

            Læs mere

           <h2 class="article-intro__title headline headline--xxlarge">

         <div class="article-intro">

          <div class="article-intro__text">
           <h2 class="article-intro__title headline headline--large">
            <a class="faux-block-link__promote" data-prefetchable="true" href="https://politiken.dk/forbrugogliv/art8133581/Sundhedsplejersken-sagde-jeg-skulle-lade-ham-gr%C3%A6de">
             <span class="article-intro__trumpet headline--theme">
              Elisas dreng sover i hendes arme dag og nat:
             </span>
            </a>
            <a class="faux-block-link__promote" data-prefetchable="true" href="https://politiken.dk/forbrugogliv/art8133581/Sundhedsplejersken-sagde-jeg-skulle-lade-ham-gr%C3%A6de">
             Sundheds­plejersken sagde, jeg skulle lade ham græde
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="save-follow-list u-margin--top-xsmall ui-font--theme">
            <li class="save-follow-list-item ui-font--theme">
             <a class="ui-font--theme" href="https://politiken.dk/forbrugogliv/">
              Forbrug og liv
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="save-follow-list-item save-follow-list-item--premium">
             <span class="save-follow-premium icon icon--premium icon--premium--theme inline-icon ui-font ui-font--theme">
             </span>
            </li>

             </span>
            </a>
            <a class="faux-block-link__promote" data-prefetchable="true" href="https://politiken.dk/indland/art8139282/Drabet-har-forenet-alverdens-kvinder-i-protest-%E2%80%93-men-er-der-grund-til-at-g%C3%A5-bange-hjem-i-nattelivet">

              <a href="https://politiken.dk/debat/debatindlaeg/art8142250/Forfatter-Min-k%C3%A6restes-verden-har-d%C3%B8gn%C3%A5bent.-Min-lukker-ved-m%C3%B8rkets-frembrud">

               </span>

              </a>

               <li class="save-follow-list-item save-follow-list-item--premium save-follow-list-item--theme">

             </h3>
            </li>
            <li class="list-item faux-block-link__promote list-item__link list-item__link--padding-large list-item--border">
             <h3 class="list-item__title headline headline--xsmall headline--black">

               <li class="save-follow-list-item save-article js-save-article save-follow-list-item--theme" data-article-id="8136974" data-read="false" data-saved="false">

           <h2 class="article-intro__title headline headline--xxlarge">
            <a class="faux-block-link__promote" data-prefetchable="true" href="https://politiken.dk/forbrugogliv/sundhedogmotion/art8143962/%C2%BBHvis-vi-er-ude-i-at-diskvalificere-en-vaccine-p%C3%A5-baggrund-af-noget-der-sker-hyppigere-ved-brugen-af-p-piller-s%C3%A5-er-vi-ude-p%C3%A5-en-glidebane%C2%AB">

             </span>
            </a>
            <a class="faux-block-link__promote" data-prefetchable="true" href="https://politiken.dk/forbrugogliv/sundhedogmotion/art8143962/%C2%BBHvis-vi-er-ude-i-at-diskvalificere-en-vaccine-p%C3%A5-baggrund-af-noget-der-sker-hyppigere-ved-brugen-af-p-piller-s%C3%A5-er-vi-ude-p%C3%A5-en-glidebane%C2%AB">
             »Hvis vi er ude i at diskvalificere en vaccine på baggrund af noget, der sker hyppigere ved brugen af p-piller, så er vi ude på en glidebane«

           <h2 class="article-intro__title headline headline--xxlarge">

             <h3 class="list-item__title headline headline--xsmall headline--black">

     <div class="container container--dynamic js-lazyload-image-container">
      <h2 class="section-header section-header--large brand ui-font--gray-lighter u-select-none">
       Podcasts
      </h2>
      <ul class="row u-clearfix">
       <li class="col col--33p col--flex">
        <article class="teaser teaser--default podcast card" data-element-type="podcast">
         <figure class="media">
          <div class="media__wrapper media__wrapper--p3x1 media__wrapper--gray" style="">
           <img alt="Jesper Sunesen / Aller Foto &amp; Vi/Ritzau Scanpix" class="media__image image--fullwidth js-lazyload-image lazyload-image" data-sizes="(max-width: 960px) 300px, (max-width: 1117px) 450px, 450px" data-srcset="https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8142772.6tk86o/ALTERNATES/p3x1_300/Poold%C3%A6kning%20X%20Factor%20Liveshow%202021 300w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8142772.6tk86o/ALTERNATES/p3x1_450/Poold%C3%A6kning%20X%20Factor%20Liveshow%202021 450w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8142772.6tk86o/ALTERNATES/p3x1_450/Poold%C3%A6kning%20X%20Factor%20Liveshow%202021 450w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" title="Jesper Sunesen / Aller Foto &amp; Vi/Ritzau Scanpix"/>
          </div>
         </figure>
         <div class="article-intro u-flex u-flex--col">
          <div class="audio-container js-audio-container">
           <div class="audio-player js-audio-player u-flex" data-restricted="false">
            <div class="audio-container__left">
             <figure class="media audio-container__channel-thumbnail">
              <div class="media__wrapper media__wrapper--p1x1 media__wrapper--gray" style="">
               <img class="media__image image--fullwidth" sizes="(max-width: 960px) 300px, (max-width: 1117px) 300px, 300px" srcset="https://politiken.dk/incoming/img6684922.q61wu5/ALTERNATES/p1x1_300/dulytter 300w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img6684922.q61wu5/ALTERNATES/p1x1_300/dulytter 300w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img6684922.q61wu5/ALTERNATES/p1x1_300/dulytter 300w"/>
              </div>
             </figure>
            </div>
            <div class="audio-container__right u-flex u-flex--grow u-flex--col u-flex--justify-content-center">
             <a href="https://politiken.dk/podcast/dulyttertilpolitiken/">
              <h4 class="icon-container--with-background audio-container__stamp stamp ui-font--theme ui-font--xxxsmall">
               Du lytter til Politiken
              </h4>
             </a>
             <a href="https://politiken.dk/podcast/dulyttertilpolitiken/art8142764/Hvordan-blev-%E2%80%99X-Factor%E2%80%99-og-fredagsslik-til-hyggehad">
              <h2 class="audio-container__title article-intro__title headline headline--xxsmall js-audio-container__title">
               <div class="u-marquee-container js-marquee-container">
                <div class="icon-container--with-background u-marquee--plain js-marquee-plain audio-container__title--plain">
                 22. marts: Hvordan blev ’X Factor’ og fredagsslik til hyggehad?
                </div>
                <div class="u-marquee u-hidden js-marquee audio-container__marquee">
                 <span class="icon-container--with-background u-marquee__target js-marquee-target">
                  22. marts: Hvordan blev ’X Factor’ og fredagsslik til hyggehad?
                  <span aria-hidden="true" class="u-marquee__target-copy js-marquee-target-copy">
                   22. marts: Hvordan blev ’X Factor’ og fredagsslik til hyggehad?
                  </span>
                 </span>
                </div>
               </div>
              </h2>
             </a>
             <div class="u-flex u-flex--row u-flex--v-align-center">
              <div class="audio-player__controls js-audio-player__controls u-flex u-flex--row u-flex--grow u-flex--v-align-center">
               <svg class="icon-container--with-background audio-player__icon audio-player__icon--play audio-trigger__icon audio-trigger__icon--play js-audio-player__button--play audio-player__icon--small" style="" viewbox="0 0 8 10" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                <path d="M8,5,0,10V0Z">
                </path>
               </svg>
               <svg class="icon-container--with-background audio-player__icon audio-player__icon--pause audio-trigger__icon audio-trigger__icon--pause js-audio-player__button--pause audio-player__icon--small" style="" viewbox="0 0 8 10" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                <rect height="10" width="2">
                </rect>
                <rect height="10" width="2" x="5">
                </rect>
               </svg>
               <div class="audio-player-progress u-flex u-flex--col u-flex--grow">
                <input class="icon-container--with-background audio-player-progress__bar js-audio-player-progress__bar" max="1636" min="0" step="any" style="--min: 0; --max: 1636; --val: 0;" type="range" value="0"/>
                <span class="audio-player__loading ui-font--xxxxsmall ui-font--gray">
                 Henter…
                </span>
               </div>
              </div>
              <time class="audio-player__time ui-font ui-font--xxsmall js-audio-player__time-remaining">
               27:16
              </time>
             </div>
            </div>
            <audio class="audio-player__element js-audio-player__element" preload="none" src="https://politiken.dk/_binary/podcast/8142768.mp3?n=1616378400000&amp;source=site&amp;originArticleId=8142768">
            </audio>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="ui-font--large ui-font--gray-dark u-margin--bottom-normal u-margin--horizontal-normal">
           <p>
            ’X Factor’-deltageren Ida Jensen var lettet, da hun forrige uge blev sendt ud af programmet. For så ville hun måske slippe for de hadefulde beskeder, hun modtager på sociale medier. Hvem er det, der skriver så grimt, når 15-årige synger falskt eller har underligt tøj på? Og hvordan endte Ida Jensen og de andre ’X Factor’-deltagere på statsministerens bord?
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </article>
       </li>
       <li class="col col--33p col--flex">
        <article class="teaser teaser--default podcast card" data-element-type="podcast">
         <figure class="media">
          <div class="media__wrapper media__wrapper--p3x1 media__wrapper--gray" style="">
           <img alt="Martin Lehmann" class="media__image image--fullwidth js-lazyload-image lazyload-image" data-sizes="(max-width: 960px) 300px, (max-width: 1117px) 450px, 450px" data-srcset="https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8141504.k23mb3/ALTERNATES/p3x1_300/Nok%20er%20nok 300w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8141504.k23mb3/ALTERNATES/p3x1_450/Nok%20er%20nok 450w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8141504.k23mb3/ALTERNATES/p3x1_450/Nok%20er%20nok 450w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" title="Martin Lehmann"/>
          </div>
         </figure>
         <div class="article-intro u-flex u-flex--col">
          <div class="audio-container js-audio-container">
           <div class="audio-player js-audio-player u-flex" data-restricted="false">
            <div class="audio-container__left">
             <figure class="media audio-container__channel-thumbnail">
              <div class="media__wrapper media__wrapper--p1x1 media__wrapper--gray" style="">

              </div>
             </figure>
            </div>
            <div class="audio-container__right u-flex u-flex--grow u-flex--col u-flex--justify-content-center">
             <a href="https://politiken.dk/podcast/dulyttertilpolitiken/">
              <h4 class="icon-container--with-background audio-container__stamp stamp ui-font--theme ui-font--xxxsmall">
               Du lytter til Politiken
              </h4>
             </a>
             <a href="https://politiken.dk/podcast/dulyttertilpolitiken/art8140497/Hvorfor-skal-coronademonstranter-straffes-dobbelt-s%C3%A5-h%C3%A5rdt">
              <h2 class="audio-container__title article-intro__title headline headline--xxsmall js-audio-container__title">
               <div class="u-marquee-container js-marquee-container">
                <div class="icon-container--with-background u-marquee--plain js-marquee-plain audio-container__title--plain">
                 19. marts: Hvorfor skal coronademonstranter straffes dobbelt så hårdt?
                </div>
                <div class="u-marquee u-hidden js-marquee audio-container__marquee">
                 <span class="icon-container--with-background u-marquee__target js-marquee-target">
                  19. marts: Hvorfor skal coronademonstranter straffes dobbelt så hårdt?
                  <span aria-hidden="true" class="u-marquee__target-copy js-marquee-target-copy">
                   19. marts: Hvorfor skal coronademonstranter straffes dobbelt så hårdt?
                  </span>
                 </span>
                </div>
               </div>
              </h2>
             </a>
             <div class="u-flex u-flex--row u-flex--v-align-center">
              <div class="audio-player__controls js-audio-player__controls u-flex u-flex--row u-flex--grow u-flex--v-align-center">
               <svg class="icon-container--with-background audio-player__icon audio-player__icon--play audio-trigger__icon audio-trigger__icon--play js-audio-player__button--play audio-player__icon--small" style="" viewbox="0 0 8 10" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                <path d="M8,5,0,10V0Z">
                </path>
               </svg>
               <svg class="icon-container--with-background audio-player__icon audio-player__icon--pause audio-trigger__icon audio-trigger__icon--pause js-audio-player__button--pause audio-player__icon--small" style="" viewbox="0 0 8 10" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                <rect height="10" width="2">
                </rect>
                <rect height="10" width="2" x="5">
                </rect>
               </svg>
               <div class="audio-player-progress u-flex u-flex--col u-flex--grow">
                <input class="icon-container--with-background audio-player-progress__bar js-audio-player-progress__bar" max="1630" min="0" step="any" style="--min: 0; --max: 1630; --val: 0;" type="range" value="0"/>
                <span class="audio-player__loading ui-font--xxxxsmall ui-font--gray">
                 Henter…
                </span>
               </div>
              </div>
              <time class="audio-player__time ui-font ui-font--xxsmall js-audio-player__time-remaining">
               27:10
              </time>
             </div>
            </div>
            <audio class="audio-player__element js-audio-player__element" preload="none" src="https://politiken.dk/_binary/podcast/8140498.mp3?n=1616119200000&amp;source=site&amp;originArticleId=8140498">
            </audio>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="ui-font--large ui-font--gray-dark u-margin--bottom-normal u-margin--horizontal-normal">
           <p>
            Med fakler, taler og råb gik vrede demonstranter på gaden den 9. januar i år. Bagefter blev flere af dem hevet i retten og fik dobbelt så hårde straffe, som de ellers ville have fået. Alene fordi det var regeringens corona-håndtering, de demonstrerede mod. Hvorfor er det sådan? Og hvad skete der egentlig den 9. januar?
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </article>
       </li>
       <li class="col col--33p col--flex">
        <article class="teaser teaser--default podcast card" data-element-type="podcast">
         <figure class="media">
          <div class="media__wrapper media__wrapper--p3x1 media__wrapper--gray" style="">
           <img alt="Christie's Images Ltd. 2021/beep/Ritzau Scanpix" class="media__image image--fullwidth js-lazyload-image lazyload-image" data-sizes="(max-width: 960px) 300px, (max-width: 1117px) 450px, 450px" data-srcset="https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8139175.9uxc6v/ALTERNATES/p3x1_300/AUCTION-CHRISTIES-NFT 300w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8139175.9uxc6v/ALTERNATES/p3x1_450/AUCTION-CHRISTIES-NFT 450w, https://politiken.dk/incoming/img8139175.9uxc6v/ALTERNATES/p3x1_450/AUCTION-CHRISTIES-NFT 450w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" title="Christie's Images Ltd. 2021/beep/Ritzau Scanpix"/>

              </div>
