            <div class="audio-container__right u-flex u-flex--grow u-flex--col u-flex--justify-content-center">
             <a href="https://politiken.dk/podcast/dulyttertilpolitiken/">
              <h4 class="icon-container--with-background audio-container__stamp stamp ui-font--theme ui-font--xxxsmall">
               Du lytter til Politiken
              </h4>
             </a>
             <a href="https://politiken.dk/podcast/dulyttertilpolitiken/art8139082/Kryptokunst-For-400-millioner-kroner-ingenting">
              <h2 class="audio-container__title article-intro__title headline headline--xxsmall js-audio-container__title">
               <div class="u-marquee-container js-marquee-container">
                <div class="icon-container--with-background u-marquee--plain js-marquee-plain audio-container__title--plain">
                 18. marts: Kryptokunst: For 400 millioner kroner ingenting?
                 <span class="icon icon--premium icon--premium--theme inline-icon inline-icon--fixed">
                 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="u-marquee u-hidden js-marquee audio-container__marquee">
                 <span class="icon-container--with-background u-marquee__target js-marquee-target">
                  18. marts: Kryptokunst: For 400 millioner kroner ingenting?
                  <span aria-hidden="true" class="u-marquee__target-copy js-marquee-target-copy">
                   18. marts: Kryptokunst: For 400 millioner kroner ingenting?
                  </span>
                 </span>
                </div>
                <span class="u-hidden js-marquee">
                 <span class="icon icon--premium icon--premium--theme inline-icon inline-icon--fixed">
                 </span>
                </span>
               </div>
              </h2>
             </a>
             <div class="u-flex u-flex--row u-flex--v-align-center">
              <div class="audio-player__controls js-audio-player__controls u-flex u-flex--row u-flex--grow u-flex--v-align-center">
               <svg class="icon-container--with-background audio-player__icon audio-player__icon--play audio-trigger__icon audio-trigger__icon--play js-audio-player__button--play audio-player__icon--small" style="" viewbox="0 0 8 10" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                <path d="M8,5,0,10V0Z">
                </path>
               </svg>
               <svg class="icon-container--with-background audio-player__icon audio-player__icon--pause audio-trigger__icon audio-trigger__icon--pause js-audio-player__button--pause audio-player__icon--small" style="" viewbox="0 0 8 10" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                <rect height="10" width="2">
                </rect>
                <rect height="10" width="2" x="5">
                </rect>
               </svg>
               <div class="audio-player-progress u-flex u-flex--col u-flex--grow">
                <input class="icon-container--with-background audio-player-progress__bar js-audio-player-progress__bar" max="2031" min="0" step="any" style="--min: 0; --max: 2031; --val: 0;" type="range" value="0"/>
                <span class="audio-player__loading ui-font--xxxxsmall ui-font--gray">
                 Henter…
                </span>
               </div>
              </div>
              <time class="audio-player__time ui-font ui-font--xxsmall js-audio-player__time-remaining">
               33:51
              </time>
             </div>
            </div>
            <audio class="audio-player__element js-audio-player__element" preload="none" src="https://politiken.dk/_binary/podcast/8139080.mp3?n=1616043600000&amp;source=site&amp;originArticleId=8139080">
            </audio>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="ui-font--large ui-font--gray-dark u-margin--bottom-normal u-margin--horizontal-normal">
           <p>
            I sidste uge solgte auktionshuset Christie’s et værk af kunstneren
Beeple til svimlende 400 millioner kroner. Men det var ikke kun
prisen, der chokerede hele kunstverdenen. For Beeple laver nemlig
såkaldt kryptokunst, så hans værker består af en computerfil, som
alle kan hente ned. Men hvordan kan sådan et billede være så meget
værd? Og er kryptokunst overhovedet kunst?
           </p>
          </div>

           <span class="audio-modal__close modal__close icon icon--close--black js-audio-modal__close">
           </span>
           <header class="audio-modal__header u-padding--top-medium">

             BLIV ABONNENT, OG LYT MED
            </h4>

            </p>

               </path>
               <path class="save-article-icon--read" d="M0 6.50322L1.125 5.26755L3.5625 7.92425L7.875 3.1875L9 4.40258L3.54375 10.375L0 6.50322Z" fill="currentColor">
               </path>
               <path class="save-article-icon--remove" d="M9 11.1L8.08125 12L4.48125 8.41875L0.9 12L0 11.1L3.58125 7.5L0 3.9L0.9 3L4.48125 6.58125L8.08125 3L9 3.9L5.4 7.48125L9 11.1Z" fill="currentColor">

              </span>

            </li>
           </ul>
          </li>
         </ol>
        </div>
       </li>

            <h2 class="article-intro__title ui-font ui-font--bold ui-font--xXlarge">
             <span class="article-intro__trumpet ui-font--theme">
              Bezzerwizzer:
             </span>
             Er du klar til dagens quiz?
            </h2>
           </div>
           <a class="article-intro__btn article-intro__btn--center faux-block-link__promote btn btn--sales btn--medium" data-link-type="digitalsale" href="https://politiken.dk/partnersites/bezzerwizzer/">
            Tag quizzen her
           </a>
          </div>

    <section class="frontpage__section u-bg--gray" data-page-section="Sektioner">
     <div class="container container--dynamic js-lazyload-image-container">

    <section class="frontpage__section u-bg--gray" data-page-section="Andre medier">
     <div class="container container--dynamic js-lazyload-image-container">
      <h2 class="section-header section-header--medium brand ui-font--gray-lighter u-select-none">
       Andre medier
      </h2>

    <section class="frontpage__section u-bg--gray" data-page-section="For abonnenterzone-forside">
     <div class="container container--dynamic js-lazyload-image-container">
      <h2 class="section-header section-header--small brand ui-font--gray-lighter u-select-none">
       For abonnenter
      </h2>
      <ul class="row u-clearfix">
       <li class="col col--25p col--flex">
        <article class="teaser teaser--flex teaser--default card faux-block-link js-int-links" data-category="small" data-element-type="relation">
         <div class="article-intro u-flex--grow article-intro--centered">
          <div class="article-intro__image">
           <figure class="media media--landscape">
            <div class="media__wrapper media__wrapper--original media__wrapper--gray" style="padding-bottom:66.33333333333333%">
             <img class="media__image image--fullwidth js-lazyload-image lazyload-image" data-sizes="(max-width: 960px) 300px, (max-width: 1117px) 300px, 300px" data-srcset="https://politiken.dk/Admin_commercial/Relationsvinduer/img5836418.btn97x/ORIGINALS/original_300/22 300w, https://politiken.dk/Admin_commercial/Relationsvinduer/img5836418.btn97x/ORIGINALS/original_300/22 300w, https://politiken.dk/Admin_commercial/Relationsvinduer/img5836418.btn97x/ORIGINALS/original_300/22 300w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="/>
            </div>
           </figure>
          </div>
          <div class="article-intro__text u-flex--grow">
           <div class="u-flex--grow">
            <h2 class="article-intro__title ui-font ui-font--bold ui-font--xXlarge">
             <span class="article-intro__trumpet ui-font--theme">
              E-avisen:
             </span>
             Læs avisen, imens vi trykker den
            </h2>
            <h3 class="article-intro__summary article-intro__summary--mt--small ui-font ui-font--gray-dark ui-font--large">
             Vi har sørget for at e-avisen er tilgængelig allerede fra kl. 21.30 aftenen forinden, så du kan være på forkant med dagens nyheder.
            </h3>
           </div>
           <a class="article-intro__btn article-intro__btn--center faux-block-link__promote btn btn--sales btn--medium" data-link-type="digitalsale" href="https://politiken.dk/shop/?promo_id=ds&amp;promo_name=eavis-fordele&amp;promo_creative=laes-om-aftenen-koeb-abonnement&amp;promo_position=abonnenter-zone-forside">

           </a>
          </div>

           <div class="u-flex--grow">
            <h2 class="article-intro__title ui-font ui-font--bold ui-font--xXlarge">
             <span class="article-intro__trumpet ui-font--theme">
              E-avisen:
             </span>
             Spring direkte til din favoritsektion

             <img class="media__image image--fullwidth js-lazyload-image lazyload-image" data-sizes="(max-width: 960px) 300px, (max-width: 1117px) 300px, 300px" data-srcset="https://politiken.dk/Admin_commercial/Relationsvinduer/img5836864.lt6hug/ALTERNATES/p3x2_300/pil 300w, https://politiken.dk/Admin_commercial/Relationsvinduer/img5836864.lt6hug/ALTERNATES/p3x2_300/pil 300w, https://politiken.dk/Admin_commercial/Relationsvinduer/img5836864.lt6hug/ALTERNATES/p3x2_300/pil 300w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="/>
            </div>
           </figure>
          </div>
          <div class="article-intro__text u-flex--grow">
           <div class="u-flex--grow">
            <h2 class="article-intro__title ui-font ui-font--bold ui-font--xXlarge">
             <span class="article-intro__trumpet ui-font--theme">
              E-avisen:
             </span>
             Læs avisen, hvor og hvornår du vil
            </h2>
            <h3 class="article-intro__summary article-intro__summary--mt--small ui-font ui-font--gray-dark ui-font--large">
             Med e-avisen har du altid Politiken lige ved hånden. Du kan let downloade avisen, så du kan tage den med på farten og ferien.
            </h3>
           </div>
           <a class="article-intro__btn article-intro__btn--center faux-block-link__promote btn btn--sales btn--medium" data-link-type="digitalsale" href="https://politiken.dk/shop/?promo_id=ds&amp;promo_name=eavis-fordele&amp;promo_creative=laes-hvor-du-vil-koeb-abonnement&amp;promo_position=abonnenter-zone-forside">
            Køb abonnement
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
         <a class="faux-block-link__overlay" data-link-type="digitalsale" href="https://politiken.dk/shop/?promo_id=ds&amp;promo_name=eavis-fordele&amp;promo_creative=laes-hvor-du-vil-koeb-abonnement&amp;promo_position=abonnenter-zone-forside" tabindex="-1">
         </a>
        </article>
       </li>
       <li class="col col--25p col--flex">
        <article class="teaser teaser--flex teaser--default card faux-block-link js-int-links" data-category="small" data-element-type="relation">
         <div class="article-intro u-flex--grow article-intro--centered">
          <div class="article-intro__image">
           <figure class="media media--landscape">
            <div class="media__wrapper media__wrapper--original media__wrapper--gray" style="padding-bottom:66.33333333333333%">
             <img class="media__image image--fullwidth js-lazyload-image lazyload-image" data-sizes="(max-width: 960px) 300px, (max-width: 1117px) 300px, 300px" data-srcset="https://politiken.dk/Admin_commercial/Relationsvinduer/img5836539.83ah1j/ORIGINALS/original_300/s%C3%B8g 300w, https://politiken.dk/Admin_commercial/Relationsvinduer/img5836539.83ah1j/ORIGINALS/original_300/s%C3%B8g 300w, https://politiken.dk/Admin_commercial/Relationsvinduer/img5836539.83ah1j/ORIGINALS/original_300/s%C3%B8g 300w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="/>
            </div>
           </figure>
          </div>
          <div class="article-intro__text u-flex--grow">
           <div class="u-flex--grow">
            <h2 class="article-intro__title ui-font ui-font--bold ui-font--xXlarge">
             <span class="article-intro__trumpet ui-font--theme">
              E-avisen:
             </span>
             Gå på opdagelse i arkivet
            </h2>
            <h3 class="article-intro__summary article-intro__summary--mt--small ui-font ui-font--gray-dark ui-font--large">
             Alle aviserne findes i en digital udgave - helt tilbage til det første oplag fra 1884. Prøv søgefunktionen, og gå på opdagelse i historien.
            </h3>
           </div>
           <a class="article-intro__btn article-intro__btn--center faux-block-link__promote btn btn--sales btn--medium" data-link-type="digitalsale" href="https://politiken.dk/shop/?promo_id=ds&amp;promo_name=eavis-fordele&amp;promo_creative=gaa-paa-opdagelse-i-arkivet-koeb-abonnement&amp;promo_position=abonnenter-zone-forside">
            Køb abonnement
           </a>
          </div>

         </a>
        </article>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
